name: Tuenti Chat More Long
description:
Expands the height of the "Tuenti Chat", removing the annoying sidebar and being able to show ALL contacts connected in a single column.
--------------------------------------
Expande el alto del "Tuenti Chat", removiendo la molesta barra lateral y pudiendo mostrar TODOS los contactos conectamos en una sola columna.
additional_info:
v1.1    (ENG) Editet for the new version of Tuenti, now the block position is also fixed.
            (SPA) Editado para la nueva version de Tuenti, ahora la posicion del bloque esta fijada.
